explains: adv. 全球地；全局地；世界上

sentences.en: Today, as urban population explodes globally, cities become more crowded.
sentences.cn: 今天，随着全球城市人口激增，城市变得更加拥挤。

sentences.en: They also donated space for 3.1 million pounds of charitable shipping globally.
sentences.cn: 他们还为全球310万英镑的慈善运输捐了场地。

sentences.en: You can get a globally optimal solution from locally optimal solutions to sub-problems.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过子问题的局部最优方案从而得到全局优化解决方案。
